title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The StyledText component is performing inefficient redraws during text changes when word wrap is enabled.
OB: During a text change when word wrap is enabled, the StyledText component is redrawing the entire text area multiple times, causing a performance issue.
EB: During a text change when word wrap is enabled, the StyledText component should only redraw the affected lines of text, minimizing the number of redraws and improving performance.
SR:
To reproduce the issue and observe the redraws, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText component.
2. Perform a text change that affects multiple lines.
3. While the text change is happening, add the following line of code to the `performPaint` method of the StyledText component: `System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);`
4. Observe the console output to see the number of redraws occurring during the text change.
